reviewText: I know I was taking a chance when ordering - the product says "unknown" regarding subtitles. Well, there are no subtitles at all, and it's in Russian. I haven't seen the movie yet so I'll give a generous five stars based on the high quality video despite everything else seeming quite literally bootleg.
This is a very beautiful film that I enjoyed watching.  I look forward to watching it on another blu-ray that has English subtitles.
